name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Marker.io: Visual bug reporting for websites

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Report visual bugs directly into your favorite tools, without leaving your website or web app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever felt frustrated with internal testing and bug reporting, either as a reporter or as a developer? So did we, and we created Marker.io to streamline those workflows.

ðŸ¤© Faster bug reporting

Set up Marker.io to integrate with your preferred bug reporting tool (like Jira, Asana, Trello, and many more) and start reporting!

Capture a screenshot of the visual bug, highlight, crop, fill in the form to create a ticket/issue/card, and continue browsing, so you never have to leave your website.

ðŸ’» Technical data

Want your developers to love you even more? Tickets created through Marker.io are automatically enriched with technical metadata and console logs, making it easier and faster for your developers to recreate and resolve any issue.

ðŸŽ¯ All about forms

The forms in Marker.io are deeply connected to your issue tracker. The fields in the form are mirrors of your tickets, so you never miss any information. Need custom forms? No problem! You can change the visible fields for both your team members and your guests and clients. Your sensitive information will remain protected.

Marker.io currently integrates with:
